mapper.select: select fb.id as id, fb.title as title, fb.content as content, fb.u_id as u_id, fb.file as file, fb.create_at as created_at, fb.update_at as updated_at, fb.delete_at as deleted_at, count(fr.free_board_id) as good_count from free_board as fb left join free_board_recommendation fr on fb.id = fr.free_board_id and fr.good_yn = 'Y' where fb.delete_yn = 'N' group by fb.id, fb.title, fb.content, fb.u_id, fb.file, fb.create_at, fb.update_at, fb.delete_at
mapper.update: update free_board_recommendation set delete_yn = 'N' where free_board_id = #{freeBoardId} and u_id = #{uId}
mapper.select: select view from free_board_view where free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board_view SET view = view + 1 WHERE free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}

select f.id as id , f.title as title , f.content as content , f.u_id as userId , f.file as file , f.create_at as createAt , f.update_at as updateAt , f.delete_at as deleteAt , f.delete_yn as deleteYn , f.main_category as mainCategoryId , m.name as mainCategoryName , f.sub_category as subCategoryId , s.name as subCategoryName , ifnull(count(r.good_yn) , 0) as goodCount , ifnull(v.view , 0) as viewCount from free_board f inner join board_main_category m on f.main_category = m.id inner join board_sub_category s on f.sub_category = s.id left join free_board_recommendation r on r.free_board_id = f.id and r.good_yn = 'Y' left join free_board_view v on v.free_board_id = f.id where delete_yn = 'N' and
m.name
s.name
f.title
f.content
like concat('%',#{search},'%') group by f.id order by f.id desc limit #{start} , 10

select count(*) from ( select f.* , ifnull(count(r.good_yn) , 0) as goodCount , ifnull(v.view , 0) as viewCount from free_board f inner join board_main_category m on f.main_category = m.id inner join board_sub_category s on f.sub_category = s.id left join free_board_recommendation r on r.free_board_id = f.id and r.good_yn = 'Y' left join free_board_view v on v.free_board_id = f.id where delete_yn = 'N' and
m.name
s.name
f.title
f.content
like concat('%',#{search},'%') group by f.id ) as count ;
